## feedback vertex set
* [â†—](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feedback_vertex_set) ... a feedback vertex set (FVS) of a graph is a set of vertices whose removal leaves a graph without cycles... . The feedback vertex set number of a graph is the size of a smallest feedback vertex set.
* can be thought of as a *distance to forest*
* is equivalent to [distance to forest](#JngPPm_dist)
